TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract MailingLabel

span.span: Represents a mailing label.

span.para: 使用属性返回对象。
使用方法可打印邮件标签在标签选项对话框的产品编号框中列出。
使用属性用于设置格式或打印的自定义邮件标签。
Use the property to return the object.
Use the method to print a mailing label listed in the Product Number box in the Label Options dialog box.
Use the property to format or print a custom mailing label.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Creator { get; }
.property instance int32 Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
如果 Microsoft Word 中创建对象，此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示字符串"MSWD。"此值也可以由常量wdCreatorCode。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

span.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

span.span: Returns a collection that represents the available custom mailing labels.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultLabelName { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultLabelName
Public Property DefaultLabelName As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultLabelName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置默认邮件标签的名称。

span.span: Returns or sets the name for the default mailing label.

span.para: 要查找的字符串指定的内置标签，请在标签选项对话框 （工具菜单、 信封和标签对话框、 标签选项卡、 选项按钮） 中选择的标签。单击详细信息，然后查看标签名称框，其中包含要用于此属性的正确字符串。要将自定义标签设置为默认邮件标签，在详细信息对话框中，使用显示的标签名称或使用属性与对象。
自动从CustomLabel对象创建新的标签文档将DefaultLabelName属性设为CustomLabel对象的名称。

To find the string for the specified built-in label, select the label in the Label Options dialog box (Tools menu, Envelopes and Labels dialog box, Labels tab, Options button). Then click Details and look at the Label name box, which contains the correct string to use for this property. To set a custom label as the default mailing label, use the label name that appears in the Details dialog box, or use the property with a object.
Creating a new label document from a CustomLabel object automatically sets the DefaultLabelName property to the name of the CustomLabel object.

summary.span: 返回或设置装有打印邮件标签纸张的默认纸盒。

span.span: Returns or sets the default paper tray that contains sheets of mailing labels.

span.para: DefaultLaserTray属性可以是一个常量。
The DefaultLaserTray property can be one of the constants.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool DefaultPrintBarCode { get; set; }
.property instance bool DefaultPrintBarCode
Public Property DefaultPrintBarCode As Boolean
public: property bool DefaultPrintBarCode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果为true POSTNET 条码被添加到信封或邮件标签，默认情况下。

span.span: True if a POSTNET bar code is added to envelopes or mailing labels by default.

span.para: 美国邮件。对于信封，此属性必须设置为True之前属性设置。
For U.S. mail only. For envelopes, this property must be set to True before the property is set.

Public Sub LabelOptions ()

span.span: Displays the Label Options dialog box.

span.para: 仅当该文档是邮件标签邮件合并主文档的工作方式时， LabelOptions方法。
The LabelOptions method works only if the document is the main document of a mailing labels mail merge.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Vertical { get; set; }
.property instance bool Vertical
Public Property Vertical As Boolean
public: property bool Vertical { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True垂直排列中文信封和邮件标签的文本。

span.span: True vertically orients text on Asian envelopes and mailing labels.

span.para: 此属性仅适用于邮件标签或信封邮件合并设置的仅适用于东亚语言。
This property works only with mailing labels or envelopes that are set up for a mail merge and applies only to Asian languages.
